reviews.review_msg: She's one of the nicest profs you'll ever meet and also cares about her students. Overall, she was super helpful and making sure the course content was clear.

Dr. Ayers was awesome! Extremely informative, very passionate about the course. It was her first time teaching SA203 and she was incredible. Definitely recommend her as a prof; there is a fair few readings but she doesn't check if you did them.
